Info.Step1: You can create workflow rules in four simple steps. These rules are executed when certain conditions are met and they allow you to send notifications and/or assign tasks to other users.
Info.Step2: You can specify certain criteria to further filter out the records the workflow will be executed against. For example, the workflow rule can be triggered when "Lead Source" is "Interested".
Info.Step3: You can define actions to execute when the workflow is triggered. You can either send an e-mail or create a new task.

Info.Info7: User fields value must be user's full name or email.
Info.Info8: Multiselect and tag fields values are seperated by "|" sign. For example: Red | Green | Blue

Validations.NotHaveLimitDay: You can use totally {{total_hour}} days for this leave type per year. You have {{remaining_hour}} days left. You can change the leave type or duration of leave and try again.
Validations.NotHaveLimitHourMonth: You can use totally {{total_hour}} hours for this leave type per month. You have {{remaining_hour}} hours left. You can change the leave type or duration of leave and try again.
Validations.NotHaveLimitDayMonth: You can use totally {{total_hour}} days for this leave type per month. You have {{remaining_hour}} days left. You can change the leave type or duration of leave and try again.
Validations.OneGoHour: This leave type can be used for max {{total_hour}} hours for each leave. You can change the leave type or duration of leave and try again.
Validations.OneGoDay: This leave type can be used for max {{total_hour}} days for each leave. You can change the leave type or duration of leave and try again.
Validations.InfusibleWithHolidays: This leave type can not be used after or before public holidays. You can change the leave type or dates of leave and try again.
Validations.BirthDayLimitDay: Happy Birthday! You can submit a Birthday Leave, 15 days before or 15 days after your birthday. Try changing the date and submit again.
Validations.BirthDayLimitMonth: Happy Birthday! You can submit a Birthday Leave within the month that your birthday is. Try changing the date and submit again.
